author: Gajus Kuizinas
title: Twitter (most likely) regrets adding Follow
text: I follow 3,468 people on Twitter. https://x.com/kuizinas When I look at my feed, for the vast majority of people, I have no idea why I am following them. There was probably an interesting Tweet I saw from them, or maybe they were mentioned by someone as worth following, etc. Either way, I don't know why this tweet is on my feed. ... and that's a problem. Follow is a weak signal On platforms like Twitter, the primary action is to follow. This starts out well, because as you are getting familiar with the platform, you discover interesting people, you follow them ‚Äì you know who is who and why you follow them. However, fast forward couple of years and thousands of follows, and your feed is a mix of strangers posting about crypto, crossfit, and whatever other passing trend. It's no longer interesting. It doesn't feel like a feed that's based on your current interests. Contrast "Follow" to adding someone to a list. Lists describe the context of why we are following someone. They can be broad (e.g. engineering, entertainment, politics), they can be narrow (e.g. classmates, coworkers), they can be temporal (e.g. 2024 node conference), etc. As your interests evolve, so do your lists. With lists, you also have the context of why you 'follow' someone ‚Äì so if you see that now their feed is mostly Pepe the Frog, and you've added them because of interesting engineering tidbits, then you know you can remove them from the list without losing much. This is probably why the vast majority of people don't even use the "Following" feed. So if lists are so great, why isn't Twitter using them? Lists never had a chance If I had to guess, the primary reason lists never took off is because of low adoption. Low adoption because of bad UX. Have you tried adding someone to a list? Trying lists just once makes me never want to use it again: I need to leave the feed to go to the person's profile 2 clicks just to get to the list (lists are in an unknown order) After creating a list the user wasn't even added to the list üí© If lists UI was made as simple as how Notion allows you to add tags, we most likely would have seen a far greater adoption of lists. Now, more than ever (thanks to AI), this process can be streamlined by: Sorting existing list suggestions based on the interaction context Suggesting new lists based on the interaction context All said and done, lists could be made as simple and enjoyable to use as "Follow" button. But why go through all of this? Lists is a treasure trove of data I already made a point for better end-user experience. However, there is a lot more to the value of lists ‚Äì lists enable relevant recommendations. Suppose you have 3 users on platform that have their own private lists. John has a list "Best designers on Earth" Mike has a list "Aspirational designers" Tracy has a list "People I want to work with" Although each list has a unique name, they share one key feature: they overlap. In this hypothetical example, within a network of millions, we found three lists with overlapping members. The greater the overlap, the more likely it is that the intent behind each list is similar. Assuming an 80% overlap, with each list containing about 30 people, this is not an unlikely coincidence in a vast network where everyone creates lists. Thus, when several lists overlap significantly, we can reasonably infer that the individuals not yet included in each list are strong candidates for addition to the others. This is a pretty simple, but powerful insight. It means that just by giving people better tools to categorize their own content, we are able to extract insights that will allow to make their experience more relevant to their evolving interests. Social feeds and talent networks Lists have been an integral part of Contra experience for clients. We believe that this is one of the reasons why we have a superior dataset for making better talent recommendations. Meanwhile, Contra Community is our first step towards graduating to a talent network More to come, but my hope is that we can utilize lists to create a community feed that adopts in near real-time to your task at hand, whether that's education, entertainment, networking, or whatever else top of mind, and make it feel magic not just based on your current engagement, but based on the engagement of people in the overlapping lists. This is exciting. The best is yet to come.

author: Delia Reynolds
title: 3 Top-Rated Tech Stocks Alps Alpine Co., Ltd. (APELY), Outbrain Inc. (OB), and Quantum Corporation (QMCO) Poised for New Year Gains
text: 3 Top-Rated Tech Stocks to Buy Poised for New Year Gains This Week 3 Top-Rated Tech Stocks to Buy Poised for New Year Gains This Week The thriving global technology industry is driven by widespread cloud adoption and pandemic-accelerated digital transformation. Against this scenario, investors could consider investing in top tech stocks Alps Alpine Co., Ltd. (APELY), Outbrain Inc. (OB), and Quantum Corporation (QMCO) for this week‚Äôs gains. Growth in the Tech Sector The growth in the tech sector, fueled by breakthroughs in generative AI, sparked a significant tech rally last year. A whopping 38.7% increase in the NASDAQ Composite over the past year indicates significant growth and positive performance in the tech sector. This suggests confidence from investors and reflects optimism about the future of technology companies. Global Consumer Electronics Market In addition, the tech hardware is staring at some hefty prospects. The global consumer electronics market is propelled by smartphone proliferation and technological advancements, notably in smart devices. Smartphones dominate revenue, while tablets show robust growth with innovation, and desktops decline due to a shift towards portable devices. Furthermore, the global Device as a Service (DaaS) market gains momentum through subscription models, embracing cloud adoption and pandemic-driven advantages like timely upgrades and scalability alignment. The global DaaS market is anticipated to expand at a CAGR of 29.1% from 2023 to 2030.

organizations.name: top-rated tech stocks alps alpine co., ltd.

author: SBT
title: V√≠tima da guerra: brasileira de 16 anos morre no L√≠bano - SBT News
text: V√≠tima da guerra: brasileira de 16 anos morre no L√≠bano Familiares anunciaram morte de jovem de Santa Catarina, que se tornaria a segunda v√≠tima brasileira no conflito entre Israel e Hezbollah Os bombardeios de Israel contra o L√≠bano deixaram mais uma v√≠tima brasileira: Mirna Raef Nasser, de 16 anos. Ela √© de Balne√°rio Cambori√∫ (SC) e teve a morte anunciada por familiares. O Itamaraty ainda n√£o confirmou o caso e disse apurar a situa√ß√£o com o consulado brasileiro em Beirute. [+ Brasileiro de 15 anos morre no L√≠bano em meio a bombardeios de Israel](https://sbtnews.sbt.com.br/noticia/governo/brasileiro-de-15-anos-morre-no-libano-em-meio-a-bombardeios-de-israel) De acordo com relatos familiares, a brasileira nasceu no Brasil e foi para o L√≠bano com a fam√≠lia enquanto ainda era crian√ßa. Conforme apurou o SBT News, a casa em que ela vivia com os pais e irm√£os ficou totalmente destru√≠da. Uma familiar tamb√©m relatou que, pela explos√£o, eles ainda n√£o conseguiram enviar a documenta√ß√£o de Mirna para confirmar a nacionalidade brasileira, o que teria impedido a notifica√ß√£o por parte do Itamaraty. Com o an√∫ncio da fam√≠lia, Mirna passa a ser a segunda brasileira v√≠tima da nova fase da guerra de Israel. Na quarta-feira (25), o Itamaraty confirmou a morte de um adolescente de 15 anos, Ali Kamal Abdallah, do Paran√°, em decorr√™ncia da explos√£o de um foguete. O pai dele era do Paraguai e tamb√©m morreu. O Minist√©rio das Rela√ß√µes Exteriores confirmou a situa√ß√£o ap√≥s intensos bombardeios a√©reos no in√≠cio da semana. Brasil condena ataques As a√ß√µes israelenses contra o L√≠bano foram condenadas pelo presidente Luiz In√°cio Lula da Silva (PT). Enquanto participou da Assembleia Geral das Na√ß√µes Unidas (ONU), o presidente destacou a morte de mulheres e crian√ßas entre as centenas de √≥bitos no pa√≠s. Ap√≥s a morte do brasileiro, Lula publicou nota em solidariedade a fam√≠lia e voltou a criticar ataques a√©reos israelenses em zonas povoadas. O governo tamb√©m fez um pedido para que as hostilidades sejam interrompidas.

author: Ramirez
title: Derrumbes en carretera CA-5 afectan tr√°fico de Comayagua a San Pedro Sula
text:
Redacci√≥n. Las lluvias que se registran en las √∫ltimas horas en el pa√≠s han provocado varios derrumbes en la carretera CA-5. Esta ma√±ana a la altura de Pito Solo, en Comayagua, dos grandes rocas se desprendieron de un cerro, bloqueando el paso a San Pedro Sula.
Lea tambi√©n: [Por quinto d√≠a se mantiene caos por derrumbe en SPS: pobladores urgen soluciones](https://tiempo.hn/por-quinto-dia-se-mantiene-caos-por-derrumbe-sps-pobladores-urgen-soluciones/)
Debido a la intensa neblina que redujo significativamente la visibilidad en la zona, un conductor de rastra perdi√≥ el control de la unidad y termin√≥ impactando contra las rocas desprendidas, que est√°n ubicadas al borde de la carretera.
Otro conductor de rastra que circulaba por la misma ruta no logr√≥ frenar a tiempo y termin√≥ chocando contra la primera, agravando a√∫n m√°s la situaci√≥n, seg√∫n un reporte del medio local HRN. El primer conductor se dirig√≠a a cargar mercader√≠a a Puerto Cort√©s y ven√≠a del hermano pa√≠s de Nicaragua.
Este doble accidente provoc√≥ un colapso parcial de la v√≠a principal que conecta Pito Solo con la ciudad industrial. La polic√≠a de tr√°nsito lleg√≥ al lugar para colaborar en la gesti√≥n de la situaci√≥n y brindar asistencia a las personas involucradas.
Otro colapso
El tr√°nsito en la carretera entre Choloma y Puerto Cort√©s se ha visto de igual manera gravemente afectado luego de un derrumbe ocurrido en el sector Bijao, que ha dejado √∫nicamente un carril habilitado.
Actualmente, s√≥lo el carril que conduce de San Pedro hacia Puerto Cort√©s est√° habilitado para los conductores, quienes deben tomar precauciones al circular por la zona.
El conductor de una rastra circulaba por la carretera cuando inesperadamente una gran cantidad de tierra del cerro se desliz√≥ y cay√≥ sobre el veh√≠culo. Afortunadamente, no se reportaron v√≠ctimas tras el derrumbe, pero el incidente ha provocado un grave colapso vial en la carretera.
Le puede interesar: [Lluvias causan inundaciones en Cort√©s y en El Progreso, Yoro](https://tiempo.hn/lluvias-causan-inundaciones-en-el-progreso-y-cortes/#:~:text=Las%20intensas%20lluvias%20registradas%20en,las%20viviendas%20se%20encuentran%20inundadas.)

author: Decatur Daily Democrat
title: HERED: Revolutionizing the aerial work platform industry with Innovation and Trust | News | decaturdailydemocrat.com
text: Introduction to HERED Welcome to HERED, the brand that's reshaping the aerial work platform industry on a global scale. With an impressive footprint across multiple continents, HERED symbolizes a blend of innovative engineering and customer-focused solutions in high-altitude operations. This brand story offers a closer look at HERED's journey, cutting-edge products, and the commitment that makes HERED a trusted name in aerial work platforms. Global Reach and Recognition HERED's evolution from a local manufacturer to a global exporter showcases its dedication to quality and adaptability. Meeting the diverse needs of different markets, HERED has established itself as a key player internationally, known for its resilience and ability to navigate complex market dynamics. Showcasing HERED‚Äôs Product Innovations HERED‚Äôs diverse product range addresses various high-altitude tasks, tailored to meet the demands of modern industries: HERED Scissor Lifts: Known for their stability and ease of operation, HERED's scissor lifts are versatile for both indoor and outdoor projects. Featuring the latest safety mechanisms, they are a top choice for construction, maintenance, and warehousing tasks. HERED Boom Lifts: These lifts provide extended reach and flexibility, making them ideal for complex construction, landscaping, and maintenance work. Their ergonomic design and advanced control systems allow for precise and safe operations. Custom Solutions: Understanding unique project requirements, HERED offers bespoke solutions. This flexibility highlights HERED‚Äôs commitment to addressing specific client needs with tailor-made products. Emphasis on Safety and Sustainability HERED integrates top-notch safety features in all its products, reflecting its commitment to operator safety and regulatory compliance. The brand‚Äôs sustainability efforts are evident in its push for energy-efficient and eco-friendly designs, aiming to minimize the environmental footprint of its products. Customer-Centric Approach Customer satisfaction is at the core of HERED's ethos. From initial consultation to after-sales service, HERED ensures a seamless experience for its clients. Technological Advancements and Future Vision HERED is at the forefront of technological advancements. With ongoing R&D, the brand is setting new benchmarks in automation, and smart safety features, underlining its vision to lead the aerial work platform sector into a new era. HERED stands as a beacon of innovation, safety, and customer satisfaction in the aerial work platform industry. To explore HERED‚Äôs range of solutions and join the family of satisfied customers, visit HERED‚Äôs official website . Media Contact Company Name: HERED Contact Person: Lee Frank Email: Send Email Phone: +86-0635-5100366 Country: China Website: https://www.hered-lift.com/

author: Jos√© M. Ramos
title: Xes√∫s B√∫a rememora, dez anos despois, a ‚Äòferida‚Äô do incendio do santuario da Virxe da Barca
text: O d√≠a de Nadal trae √° memoria dos veci√±os de Mux√≠a cada ano o incendio que o 25 de decembro de 2013 devorou o santuario da Virxe da Barca. Coincidindo co d√©cimo aniversario, o fot√≥grafo muxi√°n Xes√∫s B√∫a abre as portas do seu estudo para que, tanto a veci√±anza como os visitantes, poidan rememorar e co√±ecer en detalle as secuelas ‚Äúdun lume que feriu, e segue ferindo, a alma de todos os veci√±os e veci√±as‚Äù. A escolma de imaxes captadas coa s√∫a c√°mara nun dos d√≠as m√°is tristes da memoria colectiva de Mux√≠a, pode visitarse de 10.00 a 13.30 horas accedendo pola entrada da r√∫a da Marina, e permanecer√° aberta ao p√∫blico ata o ver√°n. ‚ÄúCoido que agora que se cumpren dez anos do incendio √© un bo momento para lembrar que os muxi√°ns seguimos coa alma ferida‚Äù, afirma B√∫a, porque o santuario contin√∫a co retablo m√°is contempor√°neo de Galicia, recreado en 200 metros cadrados de vinilo a partir dunha fotograf√≠a s√∫a, ‚Äúpero iso non √© o que queremos, pois o que desexamos √© que o templo volva a contar cun retablo do nivel que merece un santuario como o da Barca, un dos m√°is senlleiros de Galicia e co√±ecido en todo o mundo‚Äù. O voraz incendio espertou o d√≠a de Nadal √° veci√±anza de Mux√≠a que, entre o estupor e as v√°goas, nada puido facer para evitar que as lapas calcinasen a estrutura de madeira do teito, que tivo que se renovado por completo, e tam√©n o magn√≠fico retablo que en 1717 construira o escultor compostel√°n Miguel de Romay. Para suplir, provisionalmente, tan grande perda, o avogado muxi√°n Manuel Mart√≠n impulsou a iniciativa para reproducilo en vinilo.
